text:
> Using that tool to make music does not change the nature of music. I don’t think theories of art can illuminate the effect of a new tool.
<@U050XKVAGKF>, if you have a moment, would you mind elaborating on this?

Do you mean that tools used to make art don’t change that art, e.g. the same art can be accomplished with one tool as another?

From my perch, I think that tools and the art that they help to enable are very much linked, inextricably so, often times.

I do think that theories of art can illuminate the effects of a new tool — I think much of art history is a project in understanding exactly what the ramifications of a new tool may be.
